drag in.gloss: force into some kind of situation, condition, or course of action

drag on.gloss: proceed for an extended period of time

drag one's feet.gloss: postpone doing what one should be doing

drag one's heels.gloss: postpone doing what one should be doing

drag out.gloss: proceed for an extended period of time

drag up.gloss: mention something unpleasant from the past

draggle.gloss: make wet and dirty, as from rain

dragoon.gloss: compel by coercion, threats, or crude means

draw a bead on.gloss: have an ambitious plan or a lofty goal

draw a line.gloss: reasonably object (to) or set a limit (on)

draw and quarter.gloss: pull (a person) apart with four horses tied to his extremities, so as to execute him

draw back.gloss: pull back or move away or backward
use a surgical instrument to hold open (the edges of a wound or an organ)

draw close.gloss: move or arrange oneself in a comfortable and cozy position

draw in.gloss: pull inward or towards a center
direct toward itself or oneself by means of some psychological power or physical attributes
shape one's body into a curl
draw in as if by suction

draw out.gloss: remove, usually with some force or effort

draw rein.gloss: control and direct with or as if by reins

draw the line.gloss: reasonably object (to) or set a limit (on)

draw together.gloss: bring together in a common cause or emotion

draw up.gloss: make up plans or basic details for
come to a halt after driving somewhere

dredge.gloss: search (as the bottom of a body of water) for something valuable or lost

dredge up.gloss: mention something unpleasant from the past

drench.gloss: drench or submerge or be drenched or submerged

dress out.gloss: kill and prepare for market or consumption

dress up.gloss: put on special clothes to appear particularly appealing and attractive

drift off.gloss: change from a waking to a sleeping state

drive home.gloss: make clear by special emphasis and try to convince somebody of something

drive in.gloss: cause to penetrate, as with a circular motion

drive out.gloss: clear out the chest and lungs

drop-kick.gloss: make the point after a touchdown with a dropkick

drop anchor.gloss: secure a vessel with an anchor

drop by the wayside.gloss: give up in the face of defeat of lacking hope

drop dead.gloss: pass from physical life and lose all bodily attributes and functions necessary to sustain life

drop down.gloss: fall or descend to a lower place or level

drop off.gloss: change from a waking to a sleeping state
remove (cargo, people, etc.) from and leave

drop out.gloss: give up in the face of defeat of lacking hope

drop the ball.gloss: commit a faux pas or a fault or make a serious mistake

dropkick.gloss: make the point after a touchdown with a dropkick

drown.gloss: be covered with or submerged in a liquid

drowse off.gloss: change from a waking to a sleeping state

drub.gloss: beat thoroughly and conclusively in a competition or fight

drum out.gloss: remove from a position or office

dry up.gloss: dry up and shrivel due to complete loss of moisture

draggled.gloss: limp and soiled as if dragged in the mud

dramatic.gloss: sensational in appearance or thrilling in effect

dramaturgic.gloss: relating to the technical aspects of drama

dramaturgical.gloss: relating to the technical aspects of drama

draped.gloss: covered with or as if with clothes or a wrap or cloak

drawn.gloss: showing the wearing effects of overwork or care or suffering

dreaded.gloss: causing fear or dread or terror

dreadful.gloss: causing fear or dread or terror

dreamed.gloss: conceived of or imagined or hoped for

dreary.gloss: lacking in liveliness or charm or surprise

dressed.gloss: dressed or clothed especially in fine attire
(of lumber or stone) to trim and smooth
dressed in fancy or formal clothing

dressed-up.gloss: dressed in fancy or formal clothing

dressed to kill.gloss: dressed in fancy or formal clothing

dressed to the nines.gloss: dressed in fancy or formal clothing

dried-up.gloss: (used especially of vegetation) having lost all moisture

drifting.gloss: continually changing especially as from one abode or occupation to another

drip-dry.gloss: treated so as to be easily or quickly washed and dried and requiring little or no ironing
used of fabrics that do not require ironing

driven.gloss: compelled forcibly by an outside agency
urged or forced to action through moral pressure

drooping.gloss: hanging down (as from exhaustion or weakness)
having branches or flower heads that bend downward

droopy.gloss: hanging down (as from exhaustion or weakness)

dropping.gloss: coming down freely under the influence of gravity

dropsical.gloss: swollen with an excessive accumulation of fluid

drowsy.gloss: showing lack of attention or boredom

drum-like.gloss: shaped in a form resembling a drum

drum-shaped.gloss: shaped in a form resembling a drum

drunken.gloss: given to or marked by the consumption of alcohol

drippily.gloss: in a mawkish and emotional manner
